    var utag_data = {
        "structure_tree": window.tagManager.structureTree,
        "ad_site_page": window.tagManager.sitePage,
        "page_name": window.tagManager.pageName
    };

    var extraData = window.tagManager.extraData;

    if (typeof extraData != 'undefined' && extraData instanceof Object) {
        for (var key in extraData) {
            utag_data[key] = extraData[key];
        }
    }
</script>

(function (a, b, c, d) {
	a = '//tags.globo.com/utag/globo/g1/prod/utag.js';
	b = document;
	c = 'script';
	d = b.createElement(c);
	d.src = a;
	d.type = 'text/java' + c;
	d.async = true;
	a = b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0];
	a.parentNode.insertBefore(d, a);
})();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">


	function isMobile(){

		//alert(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase());

		if( navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().search("iphone") != -1 ){
			$(".android").hide();
		}else if(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().search("android") != -1 ){		
			$(".ios").hide();
		}else{

		}
	}

	isMobile();

</script>

e,n;if(n="modernizr",!h||!h.setItem)return!1;try{return h.setItem(n,n),h.removeItem(n),!0}catch(e){return l=e,console.log("localstorage error",l),!1}},p=g(),window.localStorageCache=y={save:function(e,n,t){var o,r,i;if(!p)return!1;r=60*t*1e3,i={value:n,timestamp:(new Date).getTime()+r};try{h.setItem(e,JSON.stringify(i))}catch(o){return l=o,console.log("localstorage error",l),!1}return n},load:function(e){var n,t;if(!p)return!1;try{t=JSON.parse(h.getItem(e))}catch(n){return l=n,console.log("localstorage error",l),!1}return t?(new Date).getTime()<t.timestamp&&t.value:!1}},w=function(e,n){var t;t=document.createElement("style"),t.setAttribute("type","text/css"),t.id=e,f.appendChild(t),n(null,t)},v=function(e,n,t){var o;try{return e.styleSheet?e.styleSheet.cssText=n:"textContent"in e?e.textContent=n:e.appendChild(document.createTextNode(n)),t(null)}catch(o){l=o,t(l)}},b=function(e){"STYLE"===e.tagName&&e.parentNode&&e.parentNode.removeChild(e)},c=function(e,n,t,o){w(n,function(n,r){n?o(n):(t&&(e.css+="\n/*# sourceMappingURL="+t+" */"),v(r,e.css||"",function(e){e?(b(r),o(e)):o(null,r)}))})},i=function(e,n,t,o){o=o||function(){},c({css:e},n,t,o)},a=function(e){var n;return n=document.createElement("script"),n.async=!0,null!=e&&(n.id=e),n},s=function(e,n){var t,o;return o=new XMLHttpRequest,t=-1===n.indexOf(location.host)||!C(n,"/"),!t||"withCredentials"in o?o.open(e,n,!0):"undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest?(o=new XDomainRequest,o.open(e.toLowerCase(),n)):o=null,o},o=function(){function e(){this.post=x(this.post,this),this.get=x(this.get,this),this.getJsonp=x(this.getJsonp,this),this.jsonpId=0}return e.prototype.complete=function(e,n,t,o,r,i){var s;e&&!o&&(s=e,r&&(s=JSON.stringify(e)),y.save(t,s,n)),i(e)},e.prototype.getCache=function(e,n,t){var o;return!n&&(o=y.load(e))?(t&&(o=JSON.parse(o.toString())),o):null},e.prototype.request=function(e,n,t){var o,r,i,a,c,l,u,d,p,g,f,w,m,h,b,v,y;return d=null!=t.expire&&t.expire>=0?t.expire:60,a=t.success||function(){},c=t.error||function(){},i=t.key||n,v=t.type,h=t.skipCache,b=t.timeout||null,p=null,y=t.xhrConfigsCallback,l=t.data,u=null!=t.dataType?t.dataType:v,null==v&&(v=n.split("."),v=v[v.length-1]),g="json"===v,w="json"===u,(o=this.getCache(i,h,g))?void a(o):(m=s(e,n))?(y&&"function"==typeof y&&y(m),f="undefined"!=typeof XDomainRequest&&m instanceof XDomainRequest,m.onload||(m.onload=function(e){return function(){var n;return Error",m.status,m.responseText),c(m.status,m))}}(this)),m.onerror||(m.onerror=function(){return console.error("AjaxCache Request m.send()},0):m.send(),b&&(r=function(){return null!=m.abort?m.abort():void 0},p=setTimeout(r,b)),m):(console.error("AjaxCache Request Error","This browser does not support this operation"),c("500",m),m)},e.prototype.getJsonp=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,c,l,u;return this.request("GET",e,n)},e.prototype.post=function(e,n){return this.request("POST",e,n)},e}(),window.ajaxCache=new o,r=function(){function e(){}return r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var "/><div class="detalhes">Qual seu nível de ansiedade? </div><span class="barrinha bg-cor"></span></a><a class="foto-item ordem-4  foto-item-pequeno" href="http://especiais.g1.globo.com/fantastico/2016/voce-e-mesmo-fa-de-star-wars-faca-o-quiz/"><img width="212" height="132" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/wqfYletHDyv1rt_1tM9knQQidgA=/0x62:2000x1307/212x132/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/12/05/ap_photochiang_ying-ying_FtFgsi0.jpg" alt="Você é mesmo fã de Star Wars?"/><div class="detalhes">Você é mesmo fã de Star Wars?</div><span class="barrinha bg-cor"></span></a></section><section class="box-destaque box-destaque-vertical"><div class="chamada "><h2>

                Estreias

            </h2><span class="barrinha bg-cor"></span></div><a class="foto-item ordem-2  " href="http://g1.globo.com/fantastico/noticia/2017/03/abertura-do-fantastico-resgata-o-bale-inspirado-nos-elementos-da-natureza.html"><img width="212" height="265" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/XCIj15LpdhAr1FWTxUiWBGmtOb0=/603x0:1468x1080/212x265/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/13/vn_04.jpg" alt="Veja a nova abertura do Fantástico"/><div class="detalhes">Veja a nova abertura do Fantástico</div><span class="barrinha bg-cor"></span></a><a class="foto-item ordem-3  foto-item-pequeno" href="http://especiais.g1.globo.com/fantastico/2017/quem-sou-eu/"><img width="212" height="132" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/KQr9GiswKQHDJUwc0h8BqGlf0p8=/130x0:1865x1080/212x132/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/13/frame_00-02-26.883.jpg" alt="Série mostra vida de transgêneros"/><div class="detalhes">Série mostra vida de transgêneros</div><span class="barrinha bg-cor"></span></a><a class="foto-item ordem-4  foto-item-pequeno" href="http://especiais.g1.globo.com/fantastico/2017/olha-quem-fala/"><img width="212" height="132" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/QsHzZ62GTCgyOC2ts5uXitNkSzU=/96x0:1831x1080/212x132/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/13/vinheta_olha_quem_fala.jpg" alt="Série ajuda a falar bem em público"/><div class="detalhes">Série ajuda a falar bem em público</div><span class="barrinha bg-cor"></span></a></section><section class="box-destaque box-destaque-vertical"><div class="chamada "><h2><a href="http://g1.globo.com/fantastico/shows-e-musicais/" title="Shows e musicais">
